internal.content: title: Remote Work Policy | content: The company supports flexible work arrangements including remote work options. Employees may work remotely up to 3 days per week with manager approval. Remote work agreements must be documented and reviewed quarterly. All remote workers must maintain reliable internet and appropriate workspace. | type: Remote Work
